titleStmt.title: Davids devotions upon his deliverances: set forth in a sermon at All-Saints in Derby, June 28, 1660. Being the day of publique thanksgiving for his Majesties happy restauration, by Joseph Swetnam preacher there.
titleStmt.author: Swetnam, Joseph, fl. 1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H.M. and are to bee sold at this shop, at the Phœnix in St. Pauls Church-yard, neer the little North door,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
